traits.name: Distress Spores
entries: When Rumpadump takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, Rumpadump has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Fist
entries: Melee atk +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Rapport Spores (3/Day)
entries: A 10-foot radius of spores extends from Rumpadump. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.
